description: Remove all unused functions and constants to eliminate 18 compiler warnings

tasks.title: Delete unused functions in src/actions/annotation.rs
tasks.description: Remove create_annotation, delete_annotation, toggle_resolved, update_comment, update_category, update_severity functions. These are never called and duplicate Document methods.
tasks.notes: Deleted entire file - all functions were unused

tasks.title: Delete unused functions in src/actions/navigation.rs
tasks.description: Remove next_annotation_offset, prev_annotation_offset, current_annotation_index functions. Keep annotation_offset_by_index which IS used.

tasks.title: Update src/actions/mod.rs exports
tasks.description: Remove wildcard exports that re-export unused functions. Only export what's actually used.
acceptanceCriteria: File `src/actions/mod.rs` does NOT contain `pub use annotation::*`

tasks.title: Update src/io/mod.rs exports
tasks.description: Remove ExportDocument from public exports as it's only used internally.
acceptanceCriteria: File `src/io/mod.rs` does NOT contain `ExportDocument` in pub use statement

tasks.title: Delete unused methods in src/model/text_range.rs
tasks.description: Remove len(), is_empty(), overlaps() methods that are never called.

tasks.title: Delete unused methods in src/model/annotation.rs
tasks.notes: Removed with_category and with_severity. KEPT Severity::short() - it IS used in ui.rs:207

tasks.title: Delete unused method in src/model/document.rs
tasks.description: Remove annotation_at() method that is never called.

tasks.title: Delete unused methods in src/app.rs
tasks.description: Remove cursor_offset() and sorted_annotation_ids() methods that are never called.
tasks.notes: Removed both methods and unused uuid::Uuid import

tasks.title: Fix unused items in src/ui.rs
tasks.description: Remove unused BASE color constant. Fix unused line_idx variable by prefixing with underscore.
acceptanceCriteria: File `src/ui.rs` contains `_line_idx` OR does not enumerate lines
tasks.notes: Removed BASE constant, prefixed line_idx with underscore

tasks.title: Verify zero compiler warnings
tasks.description: Run cargo check and confirm no warnings are emitted.

tasks.title: Verify tests pass
tasks.description: Run cargo test and confirm all tests pass.
acceptanceCriteria: Run `cd ~/quill-tui && cargo test` - exits with code 0

tasks.title: Verify release build succeeds
tasks.description: Build release binary to ensure no issues with optimized compilation.
acceptanceCriteria: Run `cd ~/quill-tui && cargo build --release` - exits with code 0
